influences: Plotinus, Søren Kierkegaard, Fyodor Dostoevsky, Karl Marx, Franz Kafka, Herman Melville, Friedrich Nietzsche, Simone Weil, Victor Hugo, Pascal Pia, George Orwell, André Gide, Max Stirner, Sigmund Freud
influenced: Thomas Merton, Jacques Monod, Jean-Paul Sartre, Orhan Pamuk, Mohsin Hamid, Richard Wright (author)
notable_ideas: "The absurd is the essential concept and the first truth" "Always go too far, because that's where you'll find the truth." "I rebel; therefore we exist."
